items.name: Politic Game
items.description: An Android application consisting of three minigames meant to serve as a satirical politician simulator with support for user login, leaderboards, and unlockable sprites.

items.description: An application allowing users to collect penguins on an ethereum blockchain, helping users visualize and understand the concept of blockchain.

items.name: Meal Prep 4 U
items.subtitle: Made for BostonHacks 2019
items.description: A web application designed to help university students meal prep by generating ingredients based on user's ingredients and preferences to provide healthy, cost-reducing meals.
